# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(BEPlaceholderAPI LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_library(BEPlaceholderAPI SHARED "")
set_target_properties(BEPlaceholderAPI PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "BEPlaceholderAPI")
set_target_properties(BEPlaceholderAPI PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
set_target_properties(BEPlaceholderAPI PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
target_include_directories(BEPlaceholderAPI PRIVATE
    src
)

target_compile_definitions(BEPlaceholderAPI PRIVATE
    _HAS_CXX23=1
    NOMINMAX
    UNICODE
    PAPI_EXPORTS
)
target_compile_options(BEPlaceholderAPI PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/EHa>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/EHa>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/utf-8>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/utf-8>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
string(REPLACE "/EHsc" "" CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS}")
set_target_properties(BEPlaceholderAPI PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(BEPlaceholderAPI PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(BEPlaceholderAPI PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(BEPlaceholderAPI PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(BEPlaceholderAPI PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(BEPlaceholderAPI PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET BEPlaceholderAPI PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreadedDLL")
endif()

    Demangler
    fmt
    leveldb
    snappy
    mimalloc-static

)
